## About Me

I'm Sarah Pan, a researcher and engineer interested in AI, machine learning, and computational methods. This blog is where I share my thoughts on research projects, technical insights, and other topics that catch my interest.

## About This Blog

This blog covers a range of topics including:

- AI and machine learning research
- Technical project write-ups
- Course projects and academic work
- Programming insights and tutorials

Feel free to reach out via the social links above if you'd like to connect!
